title: Game locking up, no FPS or Ping drops.
body:
http://plays.tv/s/L13ys65ZDU_l

^^

Basically my game locks up and nothing moves for a second, then it unfreezes. I can use abilities but it doesnt show until after freezing. This happened in a ranked game and I went to test it in bots after restarting my PC.

I also tried other online games to see if it was my net, but it wasn't. I also had a ping at around 38-45 while the freeze happened, as well as fine FPS.

The only thing I can think of doing is capping my FPS @ 60 might fix it, but I have yet to try that.

replies.body:
I have now the same problem as u had .
did u fix it ? 
if u did pls tell how is so anoying .

This is a primary symptom of *Packet Loss* or *High packet buffering*. It is often caused by local network configurations that prevent your client from establishing and maintaining a solid link to our servers. Common solutions can be found in our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) and shouldn't take long to work through.

Should you still encounter this issue after taking those steps, please let me know.
